title: Alternative Care Crops UpAt 'Traditional' Hospitals
author: Nancy KeatesStaff Reporter
cleaned_text: March 28, 2003 12:01 am ET When Nancy Serber went into Abbott Northwestern Hospital in Minnesota with heart problems this past October, her doctor advised her to get a chest scan and blood tests and undergo major valve-replacement surgery.
